mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(author_id, caption, image) VALUES (#{author_id}, #{caption}, #{image});
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET caption=#{caption}, updated_at=DEFAULT WHERE post_id=#{post_id};
mapper.select: SELECT post_id, author_id, user.nickname, image, CONVERT(caption USING utf8) AS caption, created_at, updated_at FROM post left join user on post.author_id=user.user_id ORDER BY created_at DESC;
